Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a brown pottery grooved vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of incised Coptic text with further traces of black paint above.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394336) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394336)
